subject: Hoaxes and Pranks
Mixed Martial Arts
Robberies and Thefts
lead_paragraph: Charles Rowan, an amateur cage fighter, faked his death but was later sentenced to prison in an armed robbery. The reporter told his tale in the long-form article “Tomato Can Blues.”
snippet: Charles Rowan, an amateur cage fighter, faked his death but was later sentenced to prison in an armed robbery. The reporter told his tale in the long-form article “Tomato Can Blues.”
